document_data.mainbody:
Tareen Kafour () was a barkeeper in Mulmaster in the late 15 century DR.
Tareen originally lived in Phlan until Vorgansharaxs coup forced her to escape to Mulmaster. There she opened a pub, the Hammer-Felled Tree.
Around 1491 DR, Tareens pub was a recruitment center for the army of Aleyd Burral.
Tareen completely approved of the Liberators cause but knew nothing about the earth cultists inside it.
